result.eng: Are you still living in America?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí i Meiriceá
result.orig: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí i Meiriceá
result.html: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí i MeiriceáAre you still living in America?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú fós i do ċónaí i MeiriceáAre you still living in America?

result.eng: Will you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.orig: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.html: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú fós ṫart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?

result.eng: They were still working at this time last year.
result.ga: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.orig: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.html: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an ḃliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.

result.eng: I am still healthy, thanks God.
result.ga: Buíochas le Dia tá mo shláinte fós agam
result.orig: Buíochas le Dia tá mo shláinte fós agam
result.html: Buíochas le Dia tá mo shláinte fós agamI am still healthy, thanks God.
result.ponchtml: Buíoċas le Dia tá mo ẛláinte fós agamI am still healthy, thanks God.

result.eng: Some of the money is still left.
result.ga: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágtha
result.orig: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágtha
result.html: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágthaSome of the money is still left.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágṫaSome of the money is still left.

result.eng: If you transfer to a different job you can still keep the allowance.
result.ga: Má aistríonn tú go post eile is féidir leat an liúntas a choimeád fós
result.orig: Má aistríonn tú go post eile is féidir leat an liúntas a choimeád fós
result.html: Má aistríonn tú go post eile is féidir leat an liúntas a choimeád fósIf you transfer to a different job you can still keep the allowance.
result.ponchtml: Má aistríonn tú go post eile is féidir leat an liúntas a ċoimeád fósIf you transfer to a different job you can still keep the allowance.

result.eng: If he's still alive.
result.ga: Má bhíonn sé fós beo
result.orig: Má bhíonn sé fós beo
result.html: Má bhíonn sé fós beoIf he's still alive.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃíonn sé fós beoIf he's still alive.

result.eng: The pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ga: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le Dia
result.orig: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le Dia
result.html: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le DiaThe pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ponchtml: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíoċas le DiaThe pub is still open, thanks God.

result.eng: They still remember you.
result.ga: Tá cuimhne acu ort fós
result.orig: Tá cuimhne acu ort fós
result.html: Tá cuimhne acu ort fósThey still remember you.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuiṁne acu ort fósThey still remember you.

result.eng: We are still friendly.
result.ga: Tá muid fós cáirdiúil
result.orig: Tá muid fós cáirdiúil
result.html: Tá muid fós cáirdiúilWe are still friendly.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid fós cáirdiúilWe are still friendly.

result.eng: I am still waiting for the letter.
result.ga: Tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litir
result.orig: Tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litir
result.html: Tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litirI am still waiting for the letter.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé fós ag fanaċt leis an litirI am still waiting for the letter.

result.eng: I am still alive.
result.ga: Tá mé fós beo
result.orig: Tá mé fós beo
result.html: Tá mé fós beoI am still alive.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé fós beoI am still alive.

result.eng: A lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.
result.ga: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn
result.orig: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn

result.ponchtml: Tá neart oibre fós le déanaṁ sna blianta amaċ roṁainnA lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.

result.eng: Are you still living in an apartment?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí in árasán
result.orig: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí in árasán
result.html: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí in árasánAre you still living in an apartment?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú fós i do ċónaí in árasánAre you still living in an apartment?

result.eng: There's a supermarket and a couple of factories in Indreabhán, but it isn't [what you would call] a town yet.
result.ga: Tá ollmhargadh agus cúpla monarcha in Indreabhán ach ní baile fós é
result.orig: Tá ollmhargadh agus cúpla monarcha in Indreabhán ach ní baile fós é

result.ponchtml: Tá ollṁargaḋ agus cúpla monarċa in Indreaḃán aċ ní baile fós éThere's a supermarket and a couple of factories in Indreabhán, but it isn't [what you would call] a town yet.

result.eng: I only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.
result.ga: Níl an teach ach cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil ach fós bíonn an-mhoill orm
result.orig: Níl an teach ach cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil ach fós bíonn an-mhoill orm

result.ponchtml: Níl an teaċ aċ cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil aċ fós bíonn an-ṁoill ormI only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.

result.eng: I'm not too good. I am learning still.
result.ga: Níl mé rómhaith Tá mé ag foghlaim fós
result.orig: Níl mé rómhaith Tá mé ag foghlaim fós
result.html: Níl mé rómhaith Tá mé ag foghlaim fósI'm not too good. I am learning still.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé róṁaiṫ Tá mé ag foġlaim fósI'm not too good. I am learning still.

result.eng: I didn't meet her, but there are plenty of people from Cois Fharraige still there.

result.eng: Did you go home yet?

result.eng: The ten of them are still alive, thank God.

result.eng: Are you still sharing an apartment with Laura?

result.eng: She still felt nauseous from the incident.

result.eng: Both countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ga: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn

result.eng: I still have the room's keyring.
result.ga: Tá fáinne eochrach an tseomra fós agam
